sentences.en: A registered dietitian can give you lots of other snack and menu ideas.
sentences.cn: 你的营养学家会提供给你一份含各种小食的建议菜单。

sentences.en: But those astronaut-designed menus must be checked by a dietitian to ensure the astronauts consume a balanced supply of nutrients.
sentences.cn: 但是那些由宇航员自己设计的菜单必须由一位营养学家检查，以确保宇航员营养供给平衡。

sentences.en: Check with your doctor or registered dietitian to re - evaluate your triglyceride - lowering diet prescription.
sentences.cn: 徵询您的医生或注册营养师的意见,评估一下您的餐单能否降低三酸甘油脂.

sentences.en: I became a dietitian not because I'm enamored of nutrients but because I love food.
sentences.cn: 我成为饮食专家不是因为我对营养物质感兴趣而是因为我喜欢食物.

sentences.en: Marcel Chan is a State Registered Dietitian, the founder of Tetra Nutritional Consultation Centre.
sentences.cn: 陈育明是一位英国注册营养师, 创办[营汇专业营养顾问中心].

sentences.en: One should be careful in choosing a dietitian , because not all of them are legitimate.
sentences.cn: 选择营养师时应当慎重, 因为不是所有的营养师都是合法的.

sentences.en: Our clinical dietitian is available to advise on special diets.
sentences.cn: 我们有临床营养师指导特殊饮食.

sentences.en: Seek the advice of a nutritionist or dietitian.
sentences.cn: 可以征求营养师或饮食专家的意见.

sentences.en: Speak with your physician or dietitian about making sure you are getting adequate nutrients while pregnant and nursing.
sentences.cn: 与你的医生或营养学家谈谈，确定在怀孕和哺乳期间，你获取了足够的营养物质。

sentences.en: Talk with your doctor and dietitian before starting a loss diet.
sentences.cn: 先和您的医生及营养师谈一谈再开始一种减肥饮食.

sentences.en: The dietitian was helpful, making suggestions as to how I could improve my diet.
sentences.cn: 这位营养学家就如何改善饮食给我提出了些建议，对我很有帮助。

sentences.en: You can seek the advice of a nutritionist or dietitian.
sentences.cn: 你可以征求营养师或饮食专家的意见。

words.tran_cn: 规定的食物；饮食的规定
营养学家；膳食学家（等于dietitian）
给…规定饮食；喂食（diet的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 饮食学家，营养学家，膳食学家
